Name: The Boar Princess
Title: The Boar Princess
Desc: In ancient legends, the Boar Kingdom was prosperous and filled with joy. The young princess of the Kingdom took the wise Fox and long-lived Tortoise, and set out on the road to the north, hoping to turn the little wolf back into that good child...

Talent.Name: The Boar Princess
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Each time you discard an Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round:</color> Gain 1 $[K411]. (Max 2)\n(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon, {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact, or {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique replaced.)

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
